title: CBS - 60 Minutes - The IAF (israeli air force) + GTR5.com
description:
CBS 60 Minutes - The IAF (israeli air force) - Apr.27, 2008
 by Michael H. Gavshon & Drew Magratten 

 Listen to them parrot the lie about how Mahmoud Ahmadinejad supposedly said he would "Push the israelis into the sea", which is a complete fabrication from an Ayatollah Khomenei quote that Ahmadinejad repeated IN FARSI; THE TRANSLATOR LIED.

 The REAL quote is "The zionist REGIME will vanish with the pages of time."

  (That&#039;s iT!)

 Multiply this repeated LiE by the number of TVs and you have TRILLIONS!=S
  Check Bruce Springsteen - 57 Channels and Nothing&#039;s On.

 Listen to the brainwashed israelis gloat about their murderous jets flying over auschwitz in a picture; people who WEREN&#039;T EVEN BORN YET, nonetheless. 

See how they train little girls to be murderers, flying cobra helicopters. 

See how everyday israelis are brainwashed into having life dreams of being &#039;special-forces&#039; (cruel-assassins).

 Watch them talk nonchalant about firing missles at children!!!

 The only saving grace here is that the interviewer asks some of the right questions, and ONE israeli who actually says "i hope there&#039;s another way." 
(in reference to the bombing of IRAN: WWIII) 

 The rest of them seem to be too stupid, braiwashed, cruel or scared to realise that an-attack-on-Iran=IS=WWIII.

 GTR5.com WakeUpFromYourSlumber.com Halaqah.com

 Be sure to check out Andrea Bocelli&#039;s Statue Of Liberty Concerto July,2001(DiVX): available here on .torrent! ooh, the irony.

Preview this video and the Bocelli Concerto on Google Video! (Just GRab &#039;eM!)

Keepvid.com will grab Google Videos. 1^Love+Enjoy! 
Replacewith Voobys.com to grab on YT.
